data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: Name two people—living or deceased—who you would invite to have dinner with you. Why did you choose those specific people? What would you hope to learn from them?
data.answer: There are two people that I would invite for dinner. One is called Chuck and the other one is called Jay. Although they both passed away now, they will always live in my heart. They were a gay couple. The reason why I would invite them for dinner was that Chuck used to work with me and he helped me a lot with my screen script writing. Before I met the couple, I had little experience with making friends with homosexual couples. So, when they were at my place, I was hoping that I could learn from them and gain experience. Chuck and Jay did share a lot of relevant information with me and helped me gain a better understanding of homosexual couples. I was very happy I met them and became good friends with them. Although they are no longer there, they will always be remembered.
